data: The `$app/server` module provides server-side utilities and helpers for SvelteKit applications. This module is only available in server-side code (hooks, routes, and server-side load functions) and cannot be used in browser contexts. It exports server-specific APIs that enable developers to access server runtime information and perform server-only operations.
Server-side module providing utilities and APIs for server-only operations in SvelteKit. Available in hooks, routes, and server load functions.
Module reference for server-side utilities in SvelteKit applications.
